entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
